Register with our cloud-hosted {{< var validmind.platform >}} so you can begin working with model documentation and configure ValidMind for your organization.

You can gain access to ValidMind in two ways:

1. [Sign up independently](#sign-up-independently)
2. [Accept an invite](#accept-an-invite)

::: {.prereq}

## Prerequisites

- [x] Access to ValidMind via the public internet.
- [x] Alternatively, you have been invited by someone else in your organization to join ValidMind.

::: {.callout}
For most users, someone with the Customer Admin role[^1] will invite you to your organization.
:::

:::

## Sign up independently 

This method will allow you to create a brand new organization to which your account will be linked to as a Customer Admin user. Choose this method if you intend to set up your organization for your institution. 

{{< include _validmind-public-internet.qmd >}}

:::: {.flex .flex-wrap .justify-around}

::: {.w-60-ns}

2. On the welcome screen, click **Sign up**.

3. Enter your email address and input a secure, unique password, or choose one of the single-sign on options to link to your account:

    - **Google**
    - **GitHub**
    - **Microsoft**

:::

::: {.w-40-ns}

![ValidMind signup welcome screen](signup-welcome-screen.png){width=90% fig-alt="Screenshot of the Validmind signup welcome screen"}

:::

::::


4. Click **Continue**.

:::: {.flex .flex-wrap .justify-around}

::: {.w-60-ns}

5. Complete your user profile details:

    - **[first name]{.smallcaps}** — Your given name.
    - **[last name]{.smallcaps}** — Your surname.
    - **[organization]{.smallcaps}** — The name of your organization you are setting up ValidMind on behalf of.
    - **[job title]{.smallcaps}** — Your role at your organization.

:::

::: {.w-40-ns}

![ValidMind profile completion screen](signup-complete-profile.png){fig-alt="Screenshot of the ValidMind profile completion screen"}

:::

::::

6. Review the terms and conditions, then select **Yes, I accept the <u>terms & conditions</u>** to indicate that you accept them. 


    Optionally, select the following if desired:

    a. **Yes, sign me up for updates from ValidMind** — Sign up for news from ValidMind
    b. **Yes, I want to join your online community** — Request to join our online community

::: {.column-margin}
::: {.callout title="ValidMind terms and conditions"}
[View in full {{< fa hand-point-right >}}](https://validmind.com/about/legal/)

:::
:::


:::: {.flex .flex-wrap .justify-around}

::: {.w-50-ns}

7. Check the email inbox for the address you used to sign up with ValidMind for the following email:

    - From: `no-reply@validmind.ai`
    - Subject: "Verify your email"

:::

::: {.w-50-ns}

![Verification email sent by ValidMind](verify-email.png){fig-alt="Screenshot of the verification email sent by ValidMind"}

:::

::::
  
::: {.column-margin}
If you cannot locate this email, ou may need to review your spam or junk mail folders and filters, or request that your IT allow-list our owned domains or retrieve any messages sent by:

a. `validmind.ai`
b. `validmind.com`
:::

:::: {.flex .flex-wrap .justify-around}

::: {.w-70-ns}

8. Click **<u>Confirm my account</u>** to gain full access to ValidMind.

    - Return to the main ValidMind dashboard by clicking on **Back to ValidMind**. 
    - Sample models are populated for you in this new organization to demonstrate the usage of ValidMind.
